GSD.description:
ext4: fix potential memory leak in ext4_fc_record_modified_inode()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit c9ce7766dc4e88e624c62a68221a3bbe8f06e856. For more details please see the references link.
